description: AWS S3 Properties used object to hold S3 related information for source/sink processing.

url.description: URL for the AWS S3 instance

sourceBucket.description: Name of the AWS S3 Source Bucket to use

sinkBucket.description: Name of the AWS S3 Sink Bucket to use

pathStyleAccessEnabled.description: Boolean that dictates if Path Style Access is Enabled

chunkedEncodingDisabled.description: Boolean that dictates if Chunk Encoding is disabled
